mapper.select: select K.CAR_KIND_TOTAL-(NVL(J1.MUC,0))AC from CAR_KIND K, (select CAR_KIND_NO, MAX(UC) MUC from (select CAR_KIND_NO, D.DA, count(*)UC from RENT_RESERV, (SELECT (TO_DATE(#{rent_reserve_startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') + LEVEL -1)DA FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE(#{rent_reserve_endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') - TO_DATE(#{rent_reserve_startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd') +1) )D where RENT_RESERV_END > DA AND RENT_RESERV_START < (DA+1) group by CAR_KIND_NO, D.DA order by D.DA ) group by CAR_KIND_NO )J1 where J1.CAR_KIND_NO (+)= K.CAR_KIND_NO AND K.car_kind_no = #{car_kind_no}
